Issue.creator: burdettadam
Issue.summary: Community PR: VCX support protocol version config
Issue.description: LibVCX can work with protocol-version 2 but the agency that an agent connects to connects to the Sovrin test network which is currently protocol version 1.In order to connect to the STN with VCX then the protocol version needs to be 1, at the moment it is hardcoded to 2.
